description:
Savoury teriyaki perfection on fluffy rice with tender vegetables and the satisfying crunch of roasted sesame and sunflower seeds.

  • Ingredients: rice, dehydrated soy chunks [texturized soy protein, water, corn semola, beef flavoured broth (hydrolyzed corn protein, glucose solids, potato starch, sugar, caramel, yeast extract, onion powder, spices), rolled oats, wheat flour, onion flakes, spices], teriyaki sauce [hydrolyzed corn protein, sugar, honey powder (corn maltodextrin, honey), glucose solids, starch (potato, corn), soy sauce soya powder (soy, wheat, maltodextrin, salt), garlic powder, spices, caramel, yeast extract, onion powder, citric acid], roasted sesame seeds, freeze-dried peas, freeze-dried red bell pepper
  • Contains: sesame, wheat, gluten (oats), soy
  • May contain: nuts, peanuts, milk, egg and shrimp
name: Happy Yak Teriyaki Rice
